## cloneDeep() function

Deep clone of object.

Like `JSON.parse(JSON.stringify(obj))`<!-- -->, but supports basic javascript types (string, number, object), `Date` and `RegExp`<!-- -->s and cycles.

Throws error if enounters object with `prototype` assuming that in general class instances cannot be reliably cloned by generic algorithm.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function cloneDeep<T>(obj: T): T;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  obj | T |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

T
